DOC.brief_summary: This project test phone intervention improve medicine-taking behavior teen IBD . The investigator study teen take medicine mouth . The investigator test two phone call help teen solve problem IBD medicine help increase often teen take medicine . The study also see extra benefit session ( four compare two ) . The investigator ask 90 teen study . Teens study 11-18 year old speak English . They must also take IBD medication mouth parent also want study . Teens agree study fill form begin ( participant week 0 ) , middle ( participant week 12 ) , end study ( participant week 20 ) . After assessment 1 , randomly assign either receive 2 phone call wait list group ( participant week 6-10 ) . After , complete second assessment . After second assessment , teens get 2 phone call right re-randomized two session session ( participant week 14-18 ) . Teens wait list group get two phone session ( participant week 14-18 ) . After , final assessment ( participant week 20 ) . The investigator expect phone intervention session reduce barrier medicine take , improve medicine taking , improve teen quality life .
